company: Gram Bangla Shonchoy O Reen Daan Shomobay Shomiti Ltd.
jobResponsibilities: Assist in various departments including agriculture financing, supply chain management, and data analysis.
Conduct research and market analysis to support business strategies.
Work closely with farmers and suppliers to understand challenges.
Participate in training sessions, workshops, and mentorship programs.
Support cross-functional teams in project execution.
Analyze data from remote sensing and machine learning models.

jobRequirements.qualifications: Fresh graduates or final-year students seeking academic internships.
additionalRequirements: Strong communication, problem-solving, and analytical abilities.
Adaptable, curious, and eager to learn.

jobResponsibilities: Conduct financial analysis for microfinance projects.
Assist in preparing reports for stakeholders and management.
Analyze financial trends and suggest business improvements.
Ensure compliance with financial regulations.

education.minimumQualification: Bachelor’s in Finance, Accounting, or Economics

jobRequirements.qualifications: Experience in financial analysis or banking sector.
additionalRequirements: Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and financial modeling.

jobResponsibilities: Manage inventory and supply chain operations.
Ensure efficient transportation and distribution of goods.
Work with vendors and suppliers to optimize costs.
Implement supply chain best practices and cost-saving strategies.

education.minimumQualification: Bachelor’s in Business Administration or Supply Chain Management

jobRequirements.qualifications: Experience in logistics or procurement is a plus.
additionalRequirements: Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.

jobResponsibilities: Assist in agricultural field research and experiments.
Collect and analyze soil and crop data.
Support scientists in laboratory research activities.
Prepare reports on agricultural findings.

education.minimumQualification: Bachelor’s in Agriculture, Biology, or Environmental Science

jobRequirements.qualifications: Fresh graduates or candidates with research experience.
additionalRequirements: Willingness to work in field conditions.
